ygData.subject: Re: Weapon choice
ygData.msgSnippet: Just so you know what to expect when attempting to pop these items, sat in HH for 3 days trying to get a PGT, I didn t even see the mob spawn once (and i know
ygData.messageBody:
Just so you know what to expect when attempting to pop these items, sat in
HH for 3 days trying to get a PGT, I didn't even see the mob spawn once (and
i know where he spawns, so that isn't a question). For the last few days we
have been doing Najena, Bone Crusher has yet to load a whip. Oh yeah, if
you are trying to pop the PGT, bring a wizard friend with you, i will almost
promise you some jerk will try to steal the kill.

-Arithon, 23 Bard
Erollisi Marr

>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>On Thu, 8 Jul 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>>
>> well the whip is around the 100pp or less range and the PGT is around the
>> 200pp or more range. so for one you need to figure out if one is twice
as
>> good as the other.
>
>Actually, I think the price difference is more because the PGT
>is much harder to get than the whip (rare spawn, camped). The
>dragoon dirk is better than either the PGT or BLW, but it
>sells for 15-30pp because it's so easy to get one, even though
>the mob that carries it is much tougher than the ones that
>carry the PGT or BLW.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
